root.name: Torino 2006
root.description: Overview Torino 2006 is a sports game based of course on the 2006 winter Olympic Games. Released 2006 on the PLaystation 2, Xbox and Microsoft Windows. Developed by 49Games and published by 2k Sports. Gameplay Within the context of the game you have different typed of gameplay options these include, Luge, bobsleigh, ski jumping, alpine skiing, biathlon, speed skating, cross-country skiing and Nordic combined Â

similar_games.game: Sled Shred featuring the Jamaican Bobsled Team
